full_summary:
### Advance Contract Award Notice

#### Project Details

* **Project Title**: Staff Office Local Area Network Kit Components
* **Government Agency**: Department of National Defence
* **Location**: Alberta, Canada

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Reference Number**: PW-23-01021879
* **Publication Date**: January 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 3, 2023 at 14:00:00 hours Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive-Selective Tendering
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

#### Goods and Services Requirement

The Department of National Defence requires the supply of various equipment and components for the Staff Office Local Area Network Kit, including:

* Cabinets, lockers, bins, and shelving
* Various printed matter
* Specialized shipping and storage containers
* Electrical hardware and supplies

#### Trade Agreements

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Leslie Hawkins
* **Title**: Material Acquisition & Support Specialist
* **Email**: leslie.hawkins@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: +1-343-572-2027

#### Evaluation Criteria

The contractor must meet the requirements for the equipment and components as specified in the Advance Contract Award Notice.

#### Additional Information

* The government intends to negotiate with a pre-selected contractor.
* Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods and services may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person by the closing date.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
